Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to notification of crime victims of the death of the accused
Summary: Requires the notification of a crime victim or witness of the death of the accused if such person dies during pending judicial proceedings or during any period of incarceration, parole or post-release supervision, or when an order of protection exists.
LawCode: Amd §§641, 646-a & 221-a, Exec L; amd §4140, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the public health law, in relation to requiring the notification of crime victims of the death of an accused
